What is it?

A session with a member of our team for 42 minutes, to speak about design, development or digital strategy.

But, how does it work?

You can a meeting with one of our experts using the form below. Then, you come with your questions / bugs / objectives for us to discuss. The OOHAA happens once per month, on a Friday afternoon. You can come to us with a problem, an idea, or just for a chin-wag.
